# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates a configuration that an image analyzer uses to find items.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ types: ImageAnalyzer.AnalysisTypes)
```

## Parameters

- **types**: The types of items that an image analyzer looks for in the image.

## Creating configurations

- **analysisTypes**: The types of items that the image analyzer looks for in the image.
- **ImageAnalyzer.AnalysisTypes**: The types of items that an image analyzer looks for in an image.

items.description: The types of items that the image analyzer looks for in the image.
